Container.Name: Collexions
Container.Overview: Collexions is a Python script that automatically manages pinned collections on the Plex home screen for specified libraries. It runs in a continuous loop, periodically unpinning old collections and pinning a new selection based on rules defined in config.json (special dates, categories, exclusions, recency, minimum item count). Uses the plexapi library. Requires config.json to be set up in the AppData path.
Container.Description: Automatically rotate pinned Plex collections based on configurable rules.

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: Set your local timezone (e.g., America/New_York, Europe/London) for correct date/time functions. List: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones

Config.Name: Appdata Path
Config.Description: Container Path: /app - Host path for storing config.json, selected_collections.json, and logs/. Place config.json inside this host directory BEFORE first run.
